meanings.definition: A pair of lights attached to the front of a vehicle for illuminating the road ahead.
meanings.sent1: The headlamps of the car shone brightly in the dark night.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to turn on your headlamps when driving in low visibility conditions.
meanings.sent3: The headlamps of the car played hide and seek with the shadows on the road.
meanings.sent4: Her bright idea was like turning on the headlamps in a dark tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The headlamps pierced through the fog like beacons of light.

meanings.definition: A light source worn on the head for hands-free illumination.
meanings.sent1: During the camping trip, we used headlamps to see in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: She wore a headlamp while exploring the cave to light her way.
meanings.sent3: The headlamp made him look like a futuristic explorer in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent4: Her bright idea was like wearing a headlamp in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The headlamp cast a circle of light around her, revealing hidden treasures.
